title: NEW CLIENT GETTING ME LEAVER BUSTER AND LOSING ME LP :(
body: the new client for some odd reason starts screwing me over, i have got 5 10 minutes leaver busters, because the client crashes and wont let me in, and then i just finished that, the client crashes again, they remake, and i get 5 20 minute leaver busters. Pretty furious, cause its the weekend, and i was going to climb, but all i have gotten is my lp taken away and leaver busters because the client actually wont work. it gets into the game and then crashes over and over, not a bug splat either. just Crashes. Please help me idk what to do .

replies.body: Any specific behavior before the crash? Unusually high latency (ping) or drops in FPS?
